text:
[Verse]
Sunrise in the morning light
Feeling like it's gonna be bright
Stretching out to touch the sky
Living life like we can fly

[Verse 2]
Dancing in the summer heat
Grass beneath our moving feet
Laughter ringing through the air
Moments that we love to share

[Chorus]
Golden days and endless nights
Underneath the city lights
Memories we'll always keep
In our hearts so deep so deep

[Verse 3]
Chasing dreams with all our might
Every wrong turning out right
Friends beside us all the way
Together we can seize the day

[Bridge]
Colors in the evening glow
Time just seems to move so slow
Holding on to what we've got
Golden days they'll never stop

[Chorus]
Golden days and endless nights
Underneath the city lights
Memories we'll always keep
In our hearts so deep so deep
title: Golden Days
